channel.title: Account problems (project 16)
channel.description:
well basically i created my own server and made my next door neighbour an admin,
he can play fine on his own but when i log in he gets connection lost and his client freezes, and when he tries to log in again it just laggs out and he has to restart mopar.
any help on what im doing wrong please?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 20, 2006, 05:13:42 PM[/size][hr]can anyone help me please?
